newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Petrofield sets 150 mln peso investment.
newsitem.headline: Petrofield sets 150 mln peso investment.

text.p: Petrofields Exploration and Development Co Inc said on Friday it would invest 150 million pesos in a property development venture with Benguetrade Inc.
The oil firm told the Philippine Stock Exchange it would form a joint venture with the subsidiary of mining firm Benguet Corp to develop a 6,236 square metre lot in the northern Philippines.
Benguetrade is using the land as its equity investment.
The joint venture will build an integrated high-end residential condominium in the mountain resort city of Baguio.
"Out of project profits, Petrofields will get 60 percent and Benguetrade, 40 percent," the company said.
Petrofield was unchanged at 0.85 centavos by midsession.
